sys_ui_macro.name: Search Button
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<button href="#" type="button" onclick="searchUsers();" name="search_button" id="search_button" title="" class="header_button btn cat-btn btn-primary" aria-label="Search" data-original-title="Search">Search</button>
<button href="#" type="button" onclick="saveProducer('');" name="enable_submit_button" id="enable_submit_button" title="" class="header_button btn cat-btn btn-primary" aria-label="Submit" style="display: inline-block;" data-original-title="Submit">Submit</button>
	
	<script>
		function hideSubmitButton()
		{
			$j("#submit_button").hide();
			$j("#enable_submit_button").hide();
		}
		function showSubmitButton()
		{
			$j("#enable_submit_button").show();
		}
		function searchUsers(startIndex, range)
		{
			if(!startIndex)
			{
				if(g_form.getValue('Name') == '')
				{
					alert('Please enter a user name');
					return false;
				}
				setSelectedUsersList('[]');
			}
			else
				addUsers(getCurrentSelectedUsersData());
		
			var dialogWindow = getDialogWindow();
			dialogWindow.render();
			
			if(!startIndex)
				startIndex = 1;
			if(!range)
				range = 100;
		
			var domainName = g_form.getValue('Select_Domain');
			var searchText = g_form.getValue('Name');
			
			var userDetailsAjax = new GlideAjax("ADMPUserListHandler");
			userDetailsAjax.addParam("sysparm_name","getADUsersList");
			userDetailsAjax.addParam("searchText",searchText);
			userDetailsAjax.addParam("domainName",domainName);
			userDetailsAjax.addParam("startIndex",startIndex);
			userDetailsAjax.addParam("range",range);
			userDetailsAjax.getXMLAnswer(userDetailsResponse);

			function userDetailsResponse(userDetails) 
			{
				loadUserList(userDetails, dialogWindow);
			}
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
